title: Vanessa's Ethics Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To award scholarships to students who are nurses or nursing students enrolled in the Certificate in Health Humanities and Ethics at the Center for Bioethics and Humanities at the CU Anschutz Medical Campus, in honor of Vanessa Lewis-DeBoer.
marketingContent: To award scholarships to College of Nursing students enrolled in the Certificate in Health Humanities and Ethics at the Center for Bioethics and Humanities at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus, in honor of Vanessa Lewis-DeBoer.
